meta_title: What Is Cost-Effective DEF? Definition & Fleet Strategy
meta_description: Cost-effective Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF) involves strategic bulk procurement and SCR maintenance to reduce emissions and operational costs in diesel fleets.
title: What Is Cost-Effective Diesel Exhaust Fluid (DEF)?
